about_the_game:
A unique yet very different kind of destruction game where you can build, knock, break, crush and destroy anything you want. Then with just the push of a button, you can repair / rebuild anything you have destroyed in a satisfying way, ready to be destroyed forever.

Destruction is infinite without any limitations. One of the best stress reduction games that allows you to get rid of extra energy with excitement and a lot of fun.

What makes this game stand out is the fact that you can destroy, shoot, explode, break with weapons, bombs or any tool you like for free. Unlike other games where you are limited.

Enjoy an exciting game where you can earn points. We are constantly uploading new creative forms so you never get bored. However, in the near future you can sell them and make money! Stay tuned for more exciting updates and enjoy the game.[url]
[/url]
detailed_description:
A unique yet very different kind of destruction game where you can build, knock, break, crush and destroy anything you want. Then with just the push of a button, you can repair / rebuild anything you have destroyed in a satisfying way, ready to be destroyed forever.

Destruction is infinite without any limitations. One of the best stress reduction games that allows you to get rid of extra energy with excitement and a lot of fun.

What makes this game stand out is the fact that you can destroy, shoot, explode, break with weapons, bombs or any tool you like for free. Unlike other games where you are limited.

Enjoy an exciting game where you can earn points. We are constantly uploading new creative forms so you never get bored. However, in the near future you can sell them and make money! Stay tuned for more exciting updates and enjoy the game.[url]

name: Enjoy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7 X64 or Win 8 X64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3610QM , Intel Core i5-4590, Intel Core i7-4700MQ, Intel Core i5-4590S ,Intel Core i5-6440HQ ,Intel Core i5-6500TE , Intel Core i5-7300HQ , AMD FX-8310 Eight-Core , AMD Opteron 6272, Intel Core i7-10510Y, Intel Pentium Gold 7505, AMD Ryzen 3 PRO 2200GE, AMD Ryzen 3 3300U , ………… And higher or better.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 ,GeForce GT 730M ,GeForce GT 740M ,Radeon HD 5670 , Radeon R5 M435, Radeon R5 A6-7480, Intel HD 5200 , Intel UHD 617 , Intel HD 530 , …….. And higher or better.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Normal sound card
  • Additional Notes: And higher or better.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 X64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K, Intel Core i7-8750H, Intel Core i3-10320, Intel Core i5-10400T, Intel Core i7-10710U, Intel Core i3-1125G4, AMD Ryzen 3 3100, AMD Ryzen 3 PRO 4200G, AMD Ryzen 3 5300U, AMD Ryzen 3 PRO 4450U, AMD EPYC 3201, Intel Core i7-5930K, Intel Core i5-9500F, AMD Ryzen 5 PRO 1600, Intel Core i7-8850H, AMD Ryzen 5 4500U, AMD Ryzen 5 1600 , AMD Ryzen 5 2600, Intel Core i5-10400F, AMD Ryzen 5 3500, Intel Core i7-8700 , ………………. And higher or better.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 , Radeon Pro WX Vega M GL , FirePro W9000 , Radeon R9 280 , GeForce GTX 1050 Ti , Radeon Pro 570 , GeForce GTX 1650 Ti with Max-Q Design , GeForce GTX 1650 (Mobile) , Radeon RX Vega M GH, Ryzen 7 4800HS with Radeon Graphics , GeForce GTX 1060 , ………. And higher or better.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Normal sound card
  • Additional Notes: And higher or better.
